body:
If you had one day left for your life, what would you do?
I would spend my time with friends and family and play soccer/football.
body_tagged:
If you had one day left for your life, what would you do?
I would spend my time with friends and family and play soccer/football.
title: [FORUM GAME] Last day

replies.body: hah! just kidding. i'd probably eat a lot of amazing food since it wouldn't matter, and i'd probably chill with my friends. steal some stuff from a store. go massively in debt on a ton of cool things to use on my last day, cause why would it matter. (although the debt would be passed to my family)
replies.body_tagged: hah! just kidding. i'd probably eat a lot of amazing food since it wouldn't matter, and i'd probably chill with my friends. steal some stuff from a store. go massively in debt on a ton of cool things to use on my last day, cause why would it matter. (although the debt would be passed to my family)

replies.body: I would still be playing video games to be honest, then give my valuables away
replies.body_tagged: I would still be playing video games to be honest, then give my valuables away

replies.body: Kill myself. Living with that knowledge -even for a day- is to hard :(
replies.body_tagged: Kill myself. Living with that knowledge -even for a day- is to hard :(

replies.body: I would tell all my friends and family what they mean to me.
replies.body_tagged: I would tell all my friends and family what they mean to me.

replies.body: Spend the entire day with my family.
replies.body_tagged: Spend the entire day with my family.

replies.body: Spend time with my family and tell them I love them.
replies.body_tagged: Spend time with my family and tell them I love them.

replies.body: I'd get into a fight with the guy at school who tells everyone your weird and ugly ;(
replies.body_tagged: I'd get into a fight with the guy at school who tells everyone your weird and ugly ;(

replies.body: Summon a genie, and wish that I could have my life back forever
replies.body_tagged: Summon a genie, and wish that I could have my life back forever

replies.body:
Tell the people I love that I loved them. 

And then I'd try my best to enjoy the rest of my life.
replies.body_tagged:
Tell the people I love that I loved them. 

And then I'd try my best to enjoy the rest of my life.

replies.body:
Rob something, or somehow get something that i have always wanted, get a girl (if you know what i mean), try to visit another country, cry, write a book..
This is depressing to write, makes time seem so valuable :(

replies.body:
Figure out a way to stop it. 

:)

replies.body:
Finish all of my building projects, use a real sword, not just a wooden stick, and then go unconscious and roll off a cliff asleep. ;)

Yea, I dont have much stuff I want to accomplish in life.
